instructions: Heat oil in a non stick skillet to medium high and saute pork chop 3 to 4 minutes per side until lightly browned.
Remove from heat and keep warm.
In same skillet, saute onion and garlic for about 2 minutes; add black pepper, tomato juice, hot sauce and Worcestershire sauce and mix well.
Add back pork; lower heat to a simmer and cook for about 10 minutes, turning once.
title: eDiets Low Carb Tangy Pork Chop
steps: Rinse and pat dry pork. Mince garlic and set aside. Heat oil in a non stick skillet to medium high and saute pork chop 3 to 4 minutes per side until lightly browned. Remove from heat and keep warm.

In same skillet, saute onion and garlic for about 2 minutes; add black pepper, tomato juice, hot sauce and Worcestershire sauce and mix well. Add back pork; lower heat to a simmer and cook for about 10 minutes, turning once. Serve over rice.
